Damage_MN.help: The Rulu-Shin are naturally resistant to several types of damage.
Damage_MN.targetHelp: The Rulu-Shin are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Damage_LT.targetHelp: The Rulu-Shin are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Damage_BS.help: The Rulu-Shin are naturally resistant to several types of damage.
Damage_BS.targetHelp: The Rulu-Shin are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Blessing_of_Rularuu.help: Rulu Shin will detonate themselves in a crisis, and attempt to take a few foes with them.
Blessing_of_Rularuu.targetHelp: Rulu Shin will detonate themselves in a crisis, and attempt to take a few foes with them.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points.

Summon_Naterling.help: The Ghoulish Mystic can animate an Acolyte to fight at his side.
Summon_Naterling.targetHelp: The Ghoulish Mystic can animate an Acolyte to fight at his side.

Power_of_the_Faithful.help: You can tap the dark essence of the Netherworld to drain a small amount of life from all enemies nearby, thus healing yourself. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Beheader.help: This is an attempt to remove your opponent's head from his neck with your Battle Axe. This attack is fairly quick for such a large weapon, and can knock down foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Chop.help: The Chop deals heavy damage with your Battle Axe, although it is much slower than Gash. This attack can knock down a target. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Gash.help: Gashes your opponent with your Battle Axe dealing superior damage. This attack is very slow, but can deal a lot damage and knock the target down. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Telekinetic_Blast.help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Bash.help: You perform a Bashing attack with your mace that deals moderate damage, and can sometimes Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
{PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Psionic_Dart.help: The Psionic Dart has slowed your attack rate.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Psychic_Scream.help: The Psychic Scream has slowed your attack rate.

Recall_Follower.help: Facemaker can resurrect a fallen Cadaver or Abomination.

messages.attackerHit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time [RECALL FOLLOWER!].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time [RECALL FOLLOWER!].

Slash.help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Throwing_Knives.help: With your natural origin you have to rely on your cunning and skill. You've acquired these throwing knives as part of your personal arsenal. You can throw these knives at a very short range, and deal minor Lethal damage to your target, but a nasty wound will do additional Damage over Time. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Fast
Throwing_Knives.targetHelp: You are taking additional Damage over Time from the wound left by the Throwing Knife.

Sacrificial_Rite.help: Rulu Shin will detonate themselves in a crisis, and attempt to take a few foes with them.
Sacrificial_Rite.targetHelp: Rulu Shin will detonate themselves in a crisis, and attempt to take a few foes with them.

messages.victimHit: The Rulu-Shin performs a Sacrificial Rite, killing himself and dealing {Damage} points of energy damage to you. It also heals all of its allies!
